component_weights.description: Enhanced ML 3.0 weights based on May 2025 market reality and Q1 sales data. Total: 100%

components.name: trigger_strength
components.description: Behavioral trigger matching (0-100). Updated with Q1 2025 conversion data.

components.name: personality_alignment
components.description: DISC personality alignment (0-100). Updated segments: I=45%, D=25%, S=20%, C=10%.

components.name: sentiment_match
components.description: Emotional state towards EV (0-100). Includes Tesla brand sentiment.

components.name: competitive_price_position
components.description: Tesla price competitiveness vs alternatives (0-100). Critical factor in Polish market.

components.name: used_ev_consideration
components.description: Impact of used EV market on Tesla purchase (0-100). 62% of Poles consider used EVs.

components.name: brand_sentiment_realtime
components.description: Real-time Tesla brand sentiment including Elon Musk factor (0-100).
components.elon_factor: Significant impact on Tesla perception in Poland

components.name: naszeauto_eligibility
components.description: NaszEauto program eligibility and impact (0-100). 1.6B PLN budget tracking.

purchase_probability_assessment.description: Enhanced ML-based conversion probability with confidence intervals.
purchase_probability_assessment.method: Score is adjusted by confidence multiplier based on data completeness and market validation.

full_data_with_history.description: Complete customer profile with interaction history

match_thresholds.description: Realistic conversion probability thresholds based on Polish EV market data.

hot_prospect.action: Immediate follow-up, schedule test drive, prepare financing options

warm_prospect.action: Nurture with targeted content, address specific objections

cold_prospect.action: Educational content, build awareness, long-term nurturing

low_potential.action: Minimal resources, focus on qualification improvement

polish_market_specifics.description: Updated factors for Polish EV market May 2025 with real infrastructure data.

infrastructure_reality_may_2025.description: Infrastructure anxiety increased to 40% due to real density data

used_ev_market_impact.description: 62% of Poles consider used EVs, fundamentally changing Tesla customer profile

price_sensitivity_enhanced.description: Price concerns increased 25% due to used EV alternatives and economic pressures

I_influence_segment.characteristics: High-income families, social media active, NaszEauto users

D_dominant_segment.concern: Ultra-premium segment leaving Tesla for traditional luxury

S_steady_segment.competitive_pressure: Losing to Kia EV6, Dacia Spring

C_conscientious_segment.characteristics: Tech engineers, TCO focused, detailed analysis
